description: Sample Dart code demonstrating the usage of NotesState with in-memory repository, including creating, updating, and searching notes.

classes.name: NotesState
classes.description: State management class for notes handling operations like refresh, add, update, and search.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model class representing a note with properties such as title, content, pinned status, creation and update timestamps.

methods.name: exampleStateUsage
methods.description: Asynchronous function demonstrating how to use the NotesState class to add, update, and search notes.
